name: places/ChIJoXBgbJ1ZwokRbr14E7ldoss
formattedAddress: 227 Waverly Pl, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 227 Waverly Pl, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: Sarah is such a beautiful spirit. She welcomes you into the space with care and ease. She is very knowledgeable and explained the treatment to me (craniosacral & TMJD) which I never have done before. The stress in my jaw subsided by the time the treatment was over and I had a deep sense of relaxation from the craniosacral treatment. I highly recommend Sarah, and I am sure the other women at Take Care are just as wonderful!

text.text: Sarah is such a beautiful spirit. She welcomes you into the space with care and ease. originalText.text: Not only does the space at Take Care make you feel at ease, but a treatment with Sarah is next level of relaxation. And you leave with glowing skin too! Will definitely make Take Care a regular part of my wellness routine!

text.text: Not only does the space at Take Care make you feel at ease, but a treatment with Sarah is next level of relaxation. And you leave with glowing skin too! Will definitely make Take Care a regular part of my wellness routine!

originalText.text: I have seen Sarah several times, and am always impressed with how different I feel post session compared to before. Sarah's soothing demeanor and wealth of knowledge makes you feel like you are in safe hands, and you can go to a deeply healing space while she works her magic. My jaw and nervous system decompresses and unwinds through her dreamy TMJ release and craniosacral therapy. LOVE this place!

text.text: I have seen Sarah several times, and am always impressed with how different I feel post session compared to before. Sarah's soothing demeanor and wealth of knowledge makes you feel like you are in safe hands, and you can go to a deeply healing space while she works her magic. My jaw and nervous system decompresses and unwinds through her dreamy TMJ release and craniosacral therapy. LOVE this place!

originalText.text: I've seen Sarah several times for both craniosacral work as well as microcurrent treatments and no matter the modality she brings such a gentle presence and skill to her work. I recently saw her for a TMJ craniosacral treatment, it was such a special treatment and I experienced a lot of relief for my jaw tension. I highly recommend booking a session with her.

text.text: I've seen Sarah several times for both craniosacral work as well as microcurrent treatments and no matter the modality she brings such a gentle presence and skill to her work. I recently saw her for a TMJ craniosacral treatment, it was such a special treatment and I experienced a lot of relief for my jaw tension. I highly recommend booking a session with her.

originalText.text:
Going to to Take Care for a facial is like taking a mini vacation. It feels incredible and you walk put looking well rested.
I have such respect for these ladies and what they do. They are so educated and knowledgeable about skin and self care and clearly are doing what they love. I am in my mid 40's and trying to age as gracefully as possible. I can see such a difference in my skin after a micro current facial, it feels lifted and hydrated with a glow. It is also such a pleasant loving experience I walk out feeling better for it. Run don't walk to this little haven of beauty. Thank you Take Care, I finally feel confident walking out with no makeup on my face. See you again very soon!
